222001.name: Challenge
222001.desc:
Go on a relaxing holiday with my friends? For some reason, I always get a sense from the activities and ducks on this island that something is about to break out.
Anyway, I should record everything that happens to make my reimbursement claims easier.

222002.name: Challenge
222002.desc:
With Apollo's help, I manage to find the first Easter egg, which reads: "3345-561-171-123432-367121-543432." What does this string of numbers mean though?
Anyway, seeing as I can't make heads or tails of it, I may as well enjoy my vacation with Izanami for now.

222003.name: Challenge
222003.desc: While on a stroll, I save a CORG agent who got himself surrounded by ducks, and I learn from him that Sekhmet is also here on the island. Is there really something going on here?

222004.name: Challenge
222004.desc: CORG, the Children of Iron, the mysterious people in black... I didn't think so many different groups would be interested in the grand prize. I should get myself some swimming gear before going out in the race!

222005.name: Challenge
222005.desc:
I've signed up for the Great Nautical Race with Skadi as my teammate. The mysterious people in black have taken advantage of the chaos the giant duck wrought to interfere in the game.
There are two of them who are especially troublesome. Once the giant duck is dealt with, those people in black are next.

222006.name: Challenge
222006.desc:
Just what must we do to restore the peace at the troubled park?
Looks like only force will be enough to stop the meaningless fighting between the AGI Mechas and the ducks. Time for battle!

222007.name: Challenge
222007.desc: Thanks to Selene's help, we manage to get to Ives Music Instruments for the second round of competition. Those dratted people in black are resorting to dirty tricks to win, as expected. How do we stop them?

222008.name: Challenge
222008.desc:
They say the enemy of my enemy is my friend. By that logic, a duck could serve as a weapon I can use to break the deadlock.
Bill and his team leave with their tails between their legs, and Selene wins this round handily. Based on the note in the music record, I'm guessing the next round will be a water gun fight?

222009.name: Challenge
222009.desc: It's been one crazy chase after another since we left the music store. Happily, we're able to get both Artemis's bag and Selene's prize back.

222010.name: Challenge
222010.desc:
We go to the water park with Zenkibo and Jinwu for the third round of the competition. In our bid to win, we find some special paint in the warehouse.
I also run into Anubis, who is on the trail of some AGI Mechas. But the competition comes first for now.

222011.name: Challenge
222011.desc: Well, I guess the enemy of my enemy isn't necessarily my friend, but as long as we defeat the enemy leader, there is nothing to fear... No! How could someone summon a giant duck like this? This is so unsportsmanlike! The only thing left to do now, then, is to deploy the special Anti-Duck AGI Mecha!

222012.name: Challenge
222012.desc: We win the third round of the contest, the prize for which is a rubber ducky. According to the announcer, the grand prize will be unveiled at the water park's closing ceremony, when all three treasures are presented together.

222013.name: Challenge
222013.desc: I give Poseidon a hand with a sudden occurrence. We really should lock all those troublemakers up! Then I'll be able to actually enjoy the rest of my vacation.

222014.name: Challenge
222014.desc:
As expected, Bill comes onto the stage to snatch the grand prize. However, to his shock, the grand prize turns out to be the joy and revelry of the contest. He flies into a rage and summons a Mecha Centaur to destroy the stage. Still, we're able to handle him.
After dealing with the troublemakers, we soak in the audience's cheers as we become the stars of the stage.

222015.name: Challenge
222015.desc: Summertime may come and go, but joy is forever. I hope the happiness we've experienced on this trip will stay in our hearts forever.
